title: WiFi Connectivity Validation Engineer
summary: Do you have a passion for taking on big challenges? Do you love pushing the limits of what’s considered feasible? As part of our Wireless Hardware group, you’ll be responsible for bringing groundbreaking wireless connectivity to the world.
description: You will be part of the dynamic and innovative WiFi System team! The team is responsible for ensuring the WiFiSystem meets the system performance specification and functions correctly. The system performance KPIs and functionalities include RvR, MU-MIMO, MU-OFDMA, Beamforming, and Coexistence. You will be responsible for developing and/or executing test methodologies for validating the connectivity performance of the state-of-the-art WiFi systems. You will work with design engineers and system integration/test engineers
key_qualifications:
Knowledge in wireless communication systems: 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ac/be
Experience testing WiFi systems in a lab Experience developing and automating tests for wireless systems Experience using and understanding lab equipment: signal analyzer, signal generator, spectrum analyzer, WiFi signaling tester.
Proficiency with CMW500 or an equivalent is a plus.
Experience using and understanding test tools: Sniffer, Wireshark, iperf, or equivalent
Experience with Python, Shell scripting, Perl, JavaScript, and/or C# Proficiency with using and controlling APs is a plus
education_experience: Bachelor's Degree in Electrical Engineering or Computer Engineering +3 years of relevant experience. Masters preferred
